mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ondutyrecord ( orgid, RecordID, RecordTime, FireControlor, gangcontrolor, ProcessResult, ControlorModel, selfcheck, eliminateVoice, RESET, MainPower, SecondPower, Faulthandling, CheckPeople, DutySign ) VALUES ( #{orgid}, #{recordID}, #{recordTime}, #{fireControlor}, #{gangcontrolor}, #{processResult}, #{controlorModel}, #{selfcheck}, #{eliminateVoice}, #{reset}, #{mainPower}, #{secondPower}, #{faulthandling}, #{checkPeople}, #{dutySign})
